    • Method Detail

      • resolveAttribute

        public static int resolveAttribute(Context context,
                   int resId)
        Convenient method for Context.getTheme() and Resources.Theme#resolveAttribute(int, TypedValue, boolean).
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        resId - The resource identifier of the desired theme attribute.
        Returns:
        the resource ID that TypedValue.resourceId points to, or 0 if not found.

      • resolveAttribute

        public static int resolveAttribute(Context context,
                   int resId,
                   int defaultValue)
        Convenient method for Context.getTheme() and Resources.Theme#resolveAttribute(int, TypedValue, boolean).
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        resId - The resource identifier of the desired theme attribute.
        defaultValue - the default value if cannot resolve resId.
        Returns:
        the resource ID that TypedValue.resourceId points to, or defaultValue if not found.
